root: ^(You’re underestimating me if you thought a simple puzzle would trip me up, Gary.)
^(I slowly open my box to get my prize of…)
^Where’s the key? Did I do all of that just to open an empty box?
^Since a few minutes after I woke up. It was a rather simple puzzle.
^So we could have left at any time?!
^We could have. But the detective is the one who’s supposed to solve the puzzle, right? I didn’t want to hog your spotlight.
^Come on. Let's get out of here already.
^Connor swipes the key from Rudolph and uses it on the door. The door opens to reveal the grand hall.
